messages.subject: Unschoolers in Birmingham? OT
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry to dive in here with something off topic, but I m trying to find an unschooling family that my two little ones could stay with while I work up there for
messages.messageBody:
Sorry to dive in here with something off topic, but I'm trying to
find an unschooling family that my two little ones could stay with
while I work up there for five days.
It wouldn't be until August 30th, and I would pay of course. It
would be for my 7 and 3.5 year old children, who would be coming
with me.
If you live in Birmingham, or know a nice family up there, would you
email me please?

Thanks a million,

Ren
